Case #: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Please fill out the attached form and return it via mail to the address listed on the form. Mailed in requests will be processed within 10 business days of receipt as long as the physical check (or a legal copy) was mailed with the form. The check number must match the one that was authorized in our system to be voided or re-issued prior to the 30 days. All emailed forms & requests will be subject to an automatic 30 day waiting period from the authorization date on the check. A response from the Checks Inbox for email sent to efs.checks@wexinc.com may take up to 10 business days, regardless of the check's eligibility for void/reissue.
